body_html:
This bug is not in tensorflow code, but I may have a possible solution.
After installing JDK on your VM, could you run the two following commands?
These may solve your problems:

$ sudo apt-get install ca-certificates-java
$ sudo update-ca-certificates -f

This seems to fix the flakes we see in our own CI builds ( #5041 ) but if you want a fix faster you may try the two above commands.

body:
This bug is not in tensorflow code, but I may have a possible solution.
After installing JDK on your VM, could you run the two following commands?
These may solve your problems:

$ sudo apt-get install ca-certificates-java
$ sudo update-ca-certificates -f

This seems to fix the flakes we see in our own CI builds ( #5041 ) but if you want a fix faster you may try the two above commands.
